cjdelisle - (06:48): writing the bash command  
cjdelisle - (06:51): Baurjan, open the file called struts-config.xml  
cjdelisle - (06:51): search for this string:  
cjdelisle - (06:51): <!-- Forward to view -->  
Baurjan - (06:55): should it be like that: <forward                 name="start"                 path="/view/Blog/WebHome"/>  
cjdelisle - (06:55): I think that should do it.  
cjdelisle - (06:56): hehe remember the old days when there were games which had a "boss key" in case the boss showed up unexpected?

Baurjan - (06:58): should i restart computer? :)  
cjdelisle - (06:58): Gimme a few minutes to get my wiki engine up so I can see what you're seeing.  
Baurjan - (06:59): ok

cjdelisle - (07:10): found it.  
cjdelisle - (07:10): It is in web.xml  
cjdelisle - (07:10): <servlet-name>redirectHomeServlet</servlet-name>  
cjdelisle - (07:10): Near that line  
Baurjan - (07:11): i have changed that file too  
Baurjan - (07:11): but no chnage  
cjdelisle - (07:13): It works for me.  
cjdelisle - (07:13): I just uncommented the section <init-param>  
cjdelisle - (07:13): and set <param-value>bin/Blog/</param-value>  
Baurjan - (07:14): ok lemme try  
cjdelisle - (07:14): And I changed the struts-config parameter back to what it was before.  
Baurjan - (07:14): thanks , it worked  
Baurjan - (07:15): what it was before?  
cjdelisle - (07:15): Sorry about having to stumble around to find the answer, never got that question before ;)  
cjdelisle - (07:15): what it was before. ie; path="/view/Main/WebHome"/>  
Baurjan - (07:15): ok
